summary:
Peter Parker Lifts Flash - High School - After Uncle Ben's Death - The A...  

Just having a shy-looking Flash in the background...
caption:
Peter Parker Lifts Flash - High School - After Uncle Ben’s Death - The A…

Just having a shy-looking Flash in the background with a cute tune makes my fangirl heart melt! ♥ 

Please make a movie focused on their relationship (and maybe more ;) )!

Oh I know I’m just dreaming, we’ll never get that before a hundred years at least. Everyone knows a one-dimensional archetypal bully Flash is the best! #sarcasm

I still hope for the second MCU Spidey movie though. We’ll see.

summary: I really want to start reading Spider-Man comics but I don’t know where to start? I’ve read a couple small pieces on Instagram....
question: I really want to start reading Spider-Man comics but I don’t know where to start? I’ve read a couple small pieces on Instagram. Please help??
answer:
No problem! This is a common question among new comers to comics. A lot of people think they need to start at the very beginning of a series to fully understand what’s going on. I have fantastic news for you – you don’t have to start reading at Amazing Fantasy #15 to get into Spidey comics, or any comics. You can pick up anywhere.

Seriously, comics are very good at recapping the story each issue. For starters, they have these little blurbs to inform readers of things/characters/events/ect that they either never heard of or simply forgot over time. See the left hand and right hand corner for an example:

They also tie in what’s going on with basic dialogue for refreshers. I’ve picked up a title before not knowing squat about it, and the first few panels involve characters recapping events “to each other” aka “to the audience.” They do this so anyone can jump in whenever they want and still understand the core plot line that exists.

So with that, I recommend you find a drawing style that interests you first. You’re looking at art while you read, after all. It’s okay if a certain artists style turns you off. One of the big reasons I first picked up Ultimate Spider-man when I was a kid was because it was colorful and the style drew to my attention. If you’ve seen some pieces on Instagram that have caught your eye, look deeper into them! You might find that it becomes “your series”.

There’s a huge run of different Spider-man titles, so because of time restraints I’ll condense the basics.

The Amazing Spider-Man:

You’re likely to find these at a lot of thrift shops, yard sales, flea markets, ect. It’s the original run from the 60′s that divided itself into volumes over the course of many decades. It stopped for a while and relaunched itself in the past couple years. It’s part of the 616 universe, which means it’s canon-canon. What happens here happens to the original Peter Parker. The issues from the 60′s/70′s/80′s/and even 90′s has a good chunk of cheese in it, so if you’re interested in that, pick these up. Fair warning: The very early issues can get…weird.

A few titles you may recognize from this series: Kraven’s Last Hunt, Infinity Gauntlet, Clone Saga, The Night Gwen Stacy Died, Secret Wars, Civil War, One More Day, Brand New Day. Beware – the last two titles erased everything in Spidey history and started anew. It’s a great place to pick up if you’re not interested in reading about history that’s been retconned.

(fyi Don’t talk to me about this I’m still bitter :-P )

Ultimate Spider-man:

This is one you’ve heard me talk about often. It’s one of those “outside universe” series for Spidey. The Ultimate Universe was created in the early 2000′s to give Marvel a fresh, urban-eqs look. They were worried that declining sales had to do with kids not picking up issues because the stories had become all adult-oriented. So they brought Peter Parker back to his roots – a teenager. If you like Spider-man Homecoming, I highly recommend this series. In fact, the MCU takes a LOT of attributes from Ultimate, both from Peter and Miles Morales. It’s a little bit dated now, having started in 2000 (god that makes me feel old, being a teenager back then…) but it still holds up well. I often find myself re-reading issues to this day.

(There was a cartoon loosely based around this series but I can’t speak for it’s entertainment as I never really watched it.)

Spidey:

This one is just friggin adorable. It’s only got 12 issues so it’s great if you want a quick read. It’s a very young Peter Parker in high-school. Most of everything is already pre-established, as well. For example, the villains come into the story as “Oh boy, there’s the Green Goblin again, ruining my day!”

Marvel Adventures Spider-Man:

Another one that focuses more for kids. It was basically the re-telling of a lot of 60′s titles in modern day format.

The Spectacular Spider-Man:

The Spectacular Spider-Man is very similar to The Amazing Spider-man and the two are often confused with each other. Amazing is largely Spider-Man stories, big action, big events, big cross overs. Everything Spidey. People came, and people went, but Spidey was always there.

Spectacular was largely – how do the every day people make up Spider-Man? So you followed stories of Aunt May, you followed entire issues of Mary Jane, the times for instance when Harry abducted Mary Jane, it was less on action as in Amazing and more on the characters, their thoughts, their feelings, and their desires. How they intertwine and intermingle. How Spider-Man impacts the characters created in Amazing.

That’s my brief run down! Please don’t be afraid of just picking up any issue you come across and reading it. Comics aren’t quite like books; they don’t need to be read from the very start. But if you DO want to jump into the game with a handful of knowledge, there’s encyclopedia books out there you can look into first. I’m guilty of collecting these things like my mother collected knicknats. Oy.

summary:
Peter: Wait, Natasha. You’re a spider. I’m a spider. We’re both spiders.
Nat: I guess…?
Peter: what if we’re related
Nat: Ummm...
body:
Peter: Wait, Natasha. You’re a spider. I’m a spider. We’re both spiders.

Nat: I guess…?

Peter: what if we’re related

Nat: Ummm no. Just no.

Peter: Okay but can you at least be Spider-Mom. It’s too good a pun to pass up.

Nat: *chokes* Jesus, Tony get in here

Tony: MY POSITION SHALL NOT BE USURPED

Peter: You’re not being usurped, da- I mean Mr. Stark

summary:
Tony: *rambling lecture*
Peter: How sesquipidelian of you, Mr. Stark.
Tony: Whaaaa?
Peter: This whole vis-a-vis we got goin'...
body:
Tony: *rambling lecture*
Peter: How sesquipidelian of you, Mr. Stark.
Tony: Whaaaa?
Peter: This whole vis-a-vis we got goin' on... raincheck?
Tony: Wha-
Peter: It's just completely ambiguous, what you're trying to tell me. 
Tony: What are you talking about?
Peter: I've been studying for my SAT and I can't shut it off.

blog.description: This is a side-blog which feeds my intense Starker obsession. Hannah/25/England/ my main is: asiriuscrushonmoony

summary: Starker Sims Thing
title: Starker Sims Thing
body:
This is slightly NFF, so yeah.

This just randomly came to me because I was thinking of playing Sims and making Starker.

  • Peter LOVES playing Sims.
  • He’s been playing it for years, and he usually creates characters from his favourite movies.
  • He usually plays non-stop for about a month and then he falls away from the game again for a year.
  • He’s finally got the urge to play again, and he decides to mod the game so that his Sims can have sex.
  • It’s not porn, he tells himself.  
  • (But really it is)
  • This time, Peter creates Sims of himself and his idol and mentor, Tony Stark.
  • He feels a little guilty - he’s never made someone he knows in real life before.
  • But he manages to make a very realistic Tony and a very realistic looking Peter.
  • He makes them meet, flirt, fall in love.
  • His heart hammers in his chest and it’s ridiculous, really, that he’s getting so excited over a game.
  • After a while, he gets them to have sex.  
  • The first time, he can’t stop himself from pulling his cock out and stroking himself to the sight of Sim-Tony and Sim-Peter fucking hard on the rug in their massive living room.
  • He becomes a little bit too obsessed with playing as them, and soon enough he’s stopped the actual game-play and all he’s doing is making them fuck in many different positions.
  • One evening, he’s deeply immersed in his game.  He watches as Tony bends Peter over the kitchen counter and started slamming into him.  
  • He has his headphones on, getting hard at the way the Sim version of himself is moaning.
  • God, how he wishes the real Tony Stark would bend him over the kitchen counter and do that to him.
  • He clicks to change the position, and watches as Tony lifts Peter onto the counter, spreads his legs wide apart and fucks him hard.
  • “Who’s that supposed to be?
  • Peter jumps, almost comically, ripping his headphones off and slamming his laptop shut.
  • His face is bright red as he realises Tony Stark is standing behind him.
  • Tony Stark.  
  • Shit, Peter thinks.  I hope he didn’t see.
  • But of course he had, he’d ask who the Sims were meant to be.
  • “N-Nobody,” Peter replies in a high voice.  He hopes Tony buys his lie.
  • But Tony only raises an eyebrow, and Peter blushes harder.
  • “You know, Mr Parker, it kinda looked like us,” Tony says, and Peter tries hard not to die at how Tony says his name.  It always turns him on when Tony addresses him as ‘Mr Parker’.
  • “Wow,” Peter laughs.  “Weird.  Soooo awkward.  Ha ha.”
  • Peter wants to kick himself.  He’s being the cringiest right now, and he knows Tony knows that his Sims porn is meant to be them.
  • “You got something you wanna tell me, kid?” Tony asked, and his tone indicates that he’s amused.
  • Peter isn’t really sure how to respond.  After an embarrassing few seconds of nervous babbling, he stands up and folds his arms.  “Mr Stark, what are you even doing here?”
  • It sounds ruder than he’d intended but he doesn’t care.  He just needs to change the subject.
  • “Did you forget we were supposed to be making improvements to your suit tonight?” Tony asked, stepping closer and making Peter’s breath hitch in his throat.
  • And Peter had forgotten.
  • “Oh crap,” Peter says.  “I- I’m so sorry.  I was… I’m an idiot, wow.  I’m sorry you came all the way here.”
  • “It’s fine,” Tony replies, smirking.  “You were obviously very busy.” Tony glances towards the laptop and then back at Peter with a wink.
  • Peter blushes hard again, heart beating fast.  “So s-sorry, Mr Stark,” he repeats, hoping Tony will just leave him to die of shame.
  • But Tony doesn’t leave.
  • “So, out of curiosity, what did your video game version of me do to get into your pants?” Tony asks, and the question catches Peter off guard.
  • “I-what?”
  • Tony doesn’t answer; only stares at Peter with a look of… lust?  Peter knows he must be imagining it.  But when Tony doesn’t show any signs that he’s going to talk, Peter knows he has to answer the question.
  • “He, uh, he didn’t really have to do anything,” Peter said quietly.  “The video game version of me wanted him more than anything.”
  • “Hmm,” Tony says.  “And what would the real-life version of me need to do to get into your pants?”
  • No, Peter tells himself.  No, this isn’t real.  This CAN’T be real.  Nope nope nope.
  • But when he scrunches his eyes shut and blinks a couple of times, Tony is still standing there, dark eyes smoldering, burning deep into him, awaiting an answer.
  • “N-nothing, Sir,” Peter stammers, heart beating so loud he thinks Tony must be able to hear it.  “Because I want you more than anything.”
  • And before Peter can process what’s happening, Tony’s lips are pressed against his and he’s in total and complete bliss.

body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2GZckyF

by rosewitchx

“he’s not fake,” peter insists. “he’s sweet, and honest, and he’s saved me.”
“yeah, he’s also a supervillain, tiger.”
pete deflates with a long sigh. “i know, mj.”
“i know you know,” she says. she pokes his side, calm. “and i know you love him anyway.”
“i do.”

–or, peter spends the weekend at mj’s.

blog.title: Pocket Sized Daydreams
blog.description: the name’s hope and I write to cope ツ

summary:
the realm of you | p.p
summary: she is an entirely new world in and of herself. A safe place; somewhere to rest his head for a...
body:
the realm of you | p.p

summary: she is an entirely new world in and of herself. A safe place; somewhere to rest his head for a bit and dream.

warnings: it’s all fluff,ladies and gents-super short and super sweet

(a/n): In honor of me being absolutely exhausted and fighting off the urge to take a nap,,,soft sleepy peter: revised!

Her heartbeat is steady beneath his ear, chest rising and falling in junction with the words slipping past her lips and into the hazy morning atmosphere. She has one hand cradling the spine of a well loved paperback and the other threading through his silky curls. He’s not sure whether he’s still dreaming or not. Her sun shrouded visage is painted a honeyed gold in the warm sheen of light seeping through the curtains; looking a bit too ethereal to be real. Her tone like the gentle, antique pings of a music box as she recites the words to her favorite pieces.

But then she sets the book down to turn the page, gaze turning back to Peter’s rumpled bed head and smushed cheek laid against the fabric of her t-shirt. He’s still half asleep, she can tell, lashes giving minuscule flutters and breaths shallow puffs from barely parted lips. Peter begins to regain a bit more consciousness when the soothing brushes of her fingertips through his hair pauses, and the melody of her voice dies down.

A dissatisfied mixture of a grumble and whine rises from Peter’s throat. His head tilts upward to plead with bleary, half lidded eyes that still have their full effect of persuasion-Maybe even more so. He can feel a soft laugh bounce around the hollow of her lungs, feather light touches resuming at the nape of his neck and curve of his jaw as she leaves the book abandoned on the sheets beside them.

I have no life but this,

To lead it here;

Nor any death, but lest

Dispelled from there;

Nor tie to earths to come,

Nor action new,

Except through this extent,

The realm of you.

He’s caught in awe of her fluent lines, drawn up from the depths of her unfathomable mind and enigmatic soul. Swaddled in the comfort of her body next to his and their hearts even closer. Most definitely a bit lost in her eyes so intently keeping themselves trained on his-no matter how close to falling shut they might be. She is anything and everything he cares to think about in that moment. He is home.

Her sun shrouded visage is painted a honeyed gold in the warm sheen of light seeping through the curtains; looking a bit too ethereal to be real. Her tone like the gentle, antique pings of a music box as she recites the words to her favorite pieces.

[[MORE]]

But then she sets the book down to turn the page, gaze turning back to Peter’s rumpled bed head and smushed cheek laid against the fabric of her t-shirt. He’s still half asleep, she can tell, lashes giving minuscule flutters and breaths shallow puffs from barely parted lips. Peter begins to regain a bit more consciousness when the soothing brushes of her fingertips through his hair pauses, and the melody of her voice dies down.

A dissatisfied mixture of a grumble and whine rises from Peter’s throat. His head tilts upward to plead with bleary, half lidded eyes that still have their full effect of persuasion-Maybe even more so. He can feel a soft laugh bounce around the hollow of her lungs, feather light touches resuming at the nape of his neck and curve of his jaw as she leaves the book abandoned on the sheets beside them.

I have no life but this,

To lead it here;

Nor any death, but lest

Dispelled from there;

Nor tie to earths to come,

Nor action new,

Except through this extent,

The realm of you.

He’s caught in awe of her fluent lines, drawn up from the depths of her unfathomable mind and enigmatic soul. Swaddled in the comfort of her body next to his and their hearts even closer. Most definitely a bit lost in her eyes so intently keeping themselves trained on his-no matter how close to falling shut they might be. She is anything and everything he cares to think about in that moment. He is home.

trail.content_raw:
the realm of you | p.p

summary:
“Good to see you’re back, Mr. Parker.”
“Glad to be back.” He had to admit, it felt great, normal even. Though he wasn’t at the...
body:
“Good to see you’re back, Mr. Parker.”

“Glad to be back.” He had to admit, it felt great, normal even. Though he wasn’t at the time, he was glad for your nagging. Everyday he found new fliers for clubs and activities anywhere you knew he would find it. He’d end up stuffing them inside his backpack, papers flying everywhere when he pulled out his spidey suit in a hurry.

Even May had been surprised when he told her where he’d be. She’d been worried, initially, about him quitting all his extracurriculars, but he’d assured her it was only because it took time away from his internship with Mr. Stark. When he explained the situation she laughed, later thanking you.

“I’m glad you’re back too, Peter.”

blog.title: It means get lost, Squidward
blog.description: Melissa || Married || 25 || They/Them || I write for anyone from the mcu, marvel actors, the outsiders, golden trio era and marauders era of harry potter || Ships, written and face-tag are open! || Requests are open!|| Icon by parkersstark ||

summary: Hi! May I request a best friend reader x Peter Parker where she gets into a fight because people are talking about him and the...
question: Hi! May I request a best friend reader x Peter Parker where she gets into a fight because people are talking about him and the roles reverse because usually she’s patching him up and now he’s patching her up? Maybe ends with one of those cliche kisses? 💞
answer:
Masterlist

Join my Taglist

Prompt lists

Ship Request Guidlines

Writing Contest!!!!

You had been Peter Parker’s best friend for thirteen years. You had been through thirteen years of half-heaven, half-hell. Thirteen years of movie nights, thirteen years of midnight snack runs, thirteen years of sleepovers, and unfortunately, thirteen years of people teasing Peter. 

He wasn’t the most outgoing person, but that doesn’t give people the right to tease him! What hurt you the most was watching Peter take it, never stand up for himself. Each time that someone spit vile words to him in the halls between classes he’d hand his head and walk away, only coming back if you were feeling feisty. He always held you back, never let you defend him from the unfair abuse he suffered.

Each time that someone teased Peter in the halls, you’d think about something that you liked about him. They said he was a nerd, you thought that was adorable.

“Y/N! Look, I rented the new DC movie, and I bought some new comic books too! Call your mom, see if you can stay over!” His eyes were wide, filled with unbridled excitement at the new superhero movie and comics. You nodded, grabbing your phone that was tossed on his bed and dialing your mom’s phone number.

“Mom? Can I stay over at Peter’s tonight? I promise I’ll actually get some sleep this time.”

“Y/N, that’s what you said last time…”

“No Mom, I promise! Please please please, I swear!”

“Alright, I guess. Just have fun and get some sleep.”

You nodded, hanging up and grinning at Peter.

“Can you stay?”

“Yep!”

“YES!” He threw a fist in the air, smile wide.

They said he was a loser, you saw it as him being shy.

“Peter, come on, please?!” 

“Ned, no! I don’t want to be dragged to some dumb party! You’re gonna leave me halfway through and I’m gonna be all alone.” Peter whined, grabbing your hand as a sort of lifesaver.

“Y/N won’t make me go, will you Y/N? You’ll be a good friend and let me stay home, in fact you’ll stay home with me? We can get junk food and watch a movie together, doesn’t that sound better than,” He shuddered for effect, “Social Interaction?!”

You laughed, nodding your head, giving in.

“Fine Peter, but one of these days Ned is gonna kill me for how often I give into you.”

They said he was everything that he wasn’t, the opposite of his wonderful qualities. That was the problem with being hopelessly in love with your best friend, you always saw the best in him. 

Today however, was your breaking point. It was Flash, the hotheaded, arrogant, good-for-nothing teenager had fired insult after insult at Peter and this time you had finally fought back.

You had wriggled out of Peter’s hold, tapping a retreating Flash on the shoulder before punching him square in the jaw when he turned around to face you.

Flash though, not seeming to find anything wrong with it, had swung his foot out, tripping you and sending you falling to the ground. Peter had grabbed you, lifting you off the ground and carrying you to the nearest restroom and begun cleaning you up. 

“Y/N, I don’t care what he was saying, you shouldn’t have punched him!” Peter’s voice rung out loud and clear in the girls’ bathroom and you prayed that no one else was there to witness your humiliation.

“Peter, you’re not my mother! (you’re not my dad!) I understand that you’re worried about me but I’m a big girl, I can do what I want.”

“Not when you’re endangering yourself for something dumb!” His fist came in contact with the counter, loud noise making you jump.

“Sorry, I’m sorry. I didn’t mean to get so angry. I just hate that you got hurt because of me.” He kept his eyes trained on your half bandaged hand, wounds still bleeding slightly.

“Peter,” You sighed, “I’m doing it because I want to make people stop talking about you behind your back. You don’t deserve that, you don’t deserve any of what you’re getting.”

“And you didn’t deserve what you got, but you got it anyways. Y/N, you realize that you could have gotten seriously hurt there, right?”

“I know, but Peter, I didn’t. I didn’t, and I stood up for you because you’re too timid to do it for yourse-” The last thing you had expected to interrupt your shouting was his lips on yours, but that was what muffled your yells. Your eyes grew twice their size, eventually fluttering closed, wrapping your hands around his shoulders while he stood inbetween your legs at the counter. Masterlist

Join my Taglist

Prompt lists

Ship Request Guidlines

Writing Contest!!!!

You had been Peter Parker’s best friend for thirteen years. You had been through thirteen years of half-heaven, half-hell. Thirteen years of movie nights, thirteen years of midnight snack runs, thirteen years of sleepovers, and unfortunately, thirteen years of people teasing Peter. 

He wasn’t the most outgoing person, but that doesn’t give people the right to tease him! What hurt you the most was watching Peter take it, never stand up for himself. Each time that someone spit vile words to him in the halls between classes he’d hand his head and walk away, only coming back if you were feeling feisty. He always held you back, never let you defend him from the unfair abuse he suffered.

Each time that someone teased Peter in the halls, you’d think about something that you liked about him. They said he was a nerd, you thought that was adorable.

“Y/N! Look, I rented the new DC movie, and I bought some new comic books too! Call your mom, see if you can stay over!” His eyes were wide, filled with unbridled excitement at the new superhero movie and comics. You nodded, grabbing your phone that was tossed on his bed and dialing your mom’s phone number.

“Mom? Can I stay over at Peter’s tonight? I promise I’ll actually get some sleep this time.”

“Y/N, that’s what you said last time…”

“No Mom, I promise! Please please please, I swear!”

“Alright, I guess. Just have fun and get some sleep.”

You nodded, hanging up and grinning at Peter.

“Can you stay?”

“Yep!”

“YES!” He threw a fist in the air, smile wide.

They said he was a loser, you saw it as him being shy.

“Peter, come on, please?!” 

“Ned, no! I don’t want to be dragged to some dumb party! You’re gonna leave me halfway through and I’m gonna be all alone.” Peter whined, grabbing your hand as a sort of lifesaver.

“Y/N won’t make me go, will you Y/N? You’ll be a good friend and let me stay home, in fact you’ll stay home with me? We can get junk food and watch a movie together, doesn’t that sound better than,” He shuddered for effect, “Social Interaction?!”

You laughed, nodding your head, giving in.

“Fine Peter, but one of these days Ned is gonna kill me for how often I give into you.”

They said he was everything that he wasn’t, the opposite of his wonderful qualities. That was the problem with being hopelessly in love with your best friend, you always saw the best in him. 

Today however, was your breaking point. It was Flash, the hotheaded, arrogant, good-for-nothing teenager had fired insult after insult at Peter and this time you had finally fought back.

You had wriggled out of Peter’s hold, tapping a retreating Flash on the shoulder before punching him square in the jaw when he turned around to face you.

Flash though, not seeming to find anything wrong with it, had swung his foot out, tripping you and sending you falling to the ground. Peter had grabbed you, lifting you off the ground and carrying you to the nearest restroom and begun cleaning you up. 

“Y/N, I don’t care what he was saying, you shouldn’t have punched him!” Peter’s voice rung out loud and clear in the girls’ bathroom and you prayed that no one else was there to witness your humiliation.

“Peter, you’re not my mother! (you’re not my dad!) I understand that you’re worried about me but I’m a big girl, I can do what I want.”

“Not when you’re endangering yourself for something dumb!” His fist came in contact with the counter, loud noise making you jump.

“Sorry, I’m sorry. I didn’t mean to get so angry. I just hate that you got hurt because of me.” He kept his eyes trained on your half bandaged hand, wounds still bleeding slightly.

“Peter,” You sighed, “I’m doing it because I want to make people stop talking about you behind your back. You don’t deserve that, you don’t deserve any of what you’re getting.”

“And you didn’t deserve what you got, but you got it anyways. Y/N, you realize that you could have gotten seriously hurt there, right?”

“I know, but Peter, I didn’t. I didn’t, and I stood up for you because you’re too timid to do it for yourse-” The last thing you had expected to interrupt your shouting was his lips on yours, but that was what muffled your yells. Your eyes grew twice their size, eventually fluttering closed, wrapping your hands around his shoulders while he stood inbetween your legs at the counter. It might not have been an ideal first kiss, but it was your first kiss, and you wouldn’t trade it for the world.
